name: Hardcoded Google API Key
impact: Attacker can misuse services and incur huge bills.
fix: Use Secrets Manager or environment variables.

name: AWS Access Key Leak
fix: Revoke key immediately and switch to IAM Roles.

name: Cleartext HTTP URL
impact: Man-In-The-Middle attacks leading to data exposure.
fix: Enforce HTTPS using a Network Security Configuration.

name: Dangerous Shell Command
impact: Allows arbitrary code execution and system modification.
fix: Remove native execution calls or sanitize input.
